text: 1997-98 Hong Kong FA Cup was the 24th staging of the Hong Kong FA Cup. It was competed by all of the 8 teams from Hong Kong First Division League. The competition kicked off on 4 May 1998 and finished on 10 May with the final. Instant-Double captured the cup for the consecutive second time after beating South China by 3-1 in the final. ==Fixtures and results == Rsssf.com, Hongkong 1997/98 ===Bracket=== ===Final=== ==References== Category:Hong Kong FA Cup Hong Kong Fa Cup Fa Cup
title: 1997–98 Hong Kong FA Cup
